column1: Tasty daal bath with good quantities (1 daal bath = 2 persons)
Cuttlery not sent.. shreekhand quantity was less
full namak ( salt ) full food sast
curd was not delivered at all
Food was tasteless. Not satisfied with food.
good, paneer bhurji was little expensive for the taste
साबुदाणा वडा आला नाही बटटा वडा आला
Very well made dishes and cooking instructions followed exactly. Good portion and very reasonable charges. Thanks
